COMMENT_TX: $Miguel Montero called out on a check swing by HP umpire Bob Davidson; Montero was angry about the call and barked as he walked away

ej,gibsk001,M,davib902,Balls and strikes $on the first pitch to Miguel Montero, HP umpire Bob Davidson called a strike on a check swing much like the third strike in the first inning; Arizona manager Kirk Gibson yelled from the dugout and was ejected by Davidson
$on the last pitch to Kelly Johnson, Cardinals pitcher Bryan Augenstein suffered a right groin strain and left the game
Phillies catcher Carlos Ruiz left the game due to an injured back
Cubs third baseman Jeff Baker left the game due to an injured shoulder

ej,quadm801,M,belld901,Call at 2B $Diamondbacks pitcher J.J. Putz threw wildly to second pulling SS Stephen Drew off the bag to the left side; when runner Marlin Byrd was called out by 2B umpire Dan Bellino, Cubs Manager Mike Quade loudly argued the call and was ejected by Bellino
Padres center fielder Cameron Maybin left the game due to an injured knee

replay,6,miraj001,ARI,westj901,PHO01,O,N,I,,H $Juan Miranda's fly ball hit just to the left of the vertical line on the wall in CF; it was ruled in play but Diamondbacks manager Kirk Gibson asked about the call; crew chief Joe West watched the replay and upheld the call

replay,8,kubej002,MIN,tscht901,PHO01,O,N,I,,H $Jason Kubel's fly ball hit the overhand in the deepest part of CF just to the left of the vertical yellow line; it was ruled in play but the Twins asked about the call so crew chief Tim Tschida watched the replay and upheld the call

$Justin Upton's throw to the plate bounced by catcher Miguel Montero; pitcher Aaron Heilman caught the ball and threw to 2B; the ball bounced and was not handled by SS Stephen Drew; when Michael Cuddyer tried to score, Drew's throw back to the plate was late as Cuddyer touched the plate just ahead of Montero's tag

$Jason Marquis swung at a pitch which came in on him; the ball glanced off his bat and hit Marquis in the chest; 3B umpire Vic Carapazza ruled it a swing on the half swing; Marquis argued that the ball struck the bat but he was ruled out on strike three
$Jayson Werth was not happy that he was hit by the pitch; HP umpire Rob Drake ran out from behind the plate and escorted Werth down the line towards 1B; Drake issued a warning to both teams
$Jayson Werth ran into foul territory, leapt and caught the ball over the top of the fence at the visiting bullpen

ej,marqj001,P,drakr901,Intentional HBP ej,riggj801,M,drakr901,Intentional HBP $Justin Upton gets hit for the fourth time in the series; Nationals pitcher Jason Marquis and manager Jim Riggleman were ejected by HP umpire Rob Drake because of the earlier warnings; Marquis yells at Drake because he claimed not to be throwing at a batter in a 1-0 game; Riggleman came out and argued with crew chief Gary Darling to no avail

ej,vasqe001,P,drakr901,Intentional HBP ej,gibsk001,M,drakr901,Intentional HBP $Danny Espinosa is hit on the back by the pitch; he yells at pitcher Esmerling Vasquez and HP umpire Rob Drake leans on Espinosa and starts him down the 1B line; catcher Miguel Montero yells at Espinosa; Drake ejected Vasquez and D-Backs manager Kirk Gibson because of the earlier warnings
$batter Eli Whiteside called out because of interference by runner Bill Hall at 2B
$D-Backs SS Stephen Drew ran through a stop sign at 3B; as he slid across the plate, his right foot got caught under him; he left with a fractured right ankle and is done for the year

$Brewers CF Carlos Gomez made a diving catch of Ryan Roberts soft liner in left center; he landed on his left shoulder and rolled, coming back to his feet; however, he fractured his left clavicle when he landed and left the game; LF Ryan Braun said that he heard the bone snap as he was running towards the ball

replay,8,braur002,MIL,mcclt901,PHO01,F,Y,I,,H $Ryan Braun hit the second pitch down the RF line; the ball was ruled fair and a home run; when D-Backs manager Kirk Gibson asked 1B umpire Marvin Hudson about the call, Hudson conferred with crew chief Tim McClelland; McClelland watched the replay and overturned the call to a foul ball
D-backs second baseman Kelly Johnson left the game due to an injured leg
D-backs third baseman Geoff Blum left the game due to an injured hand
Dodgers shortstop Dee Gordon left the game due to an injured shoulder
D-backs first baseman Xavier Nady left the game due to a fractured hand
Mets pitcher Mike Pelfrey left the game due to an injured elbow
$D-backs pitcher Jason Marquis was hit by a one-hopper on the lower right leg

$Josh Thole fell to the ground after being hit by the pitch; pitcher Jason Marquis fell to the ground after throwing the pitch as he felt something pop in his leg; apparently, his right fibula was fractured when he was hit by the batter ball in the third inning and pushing off the mound completed the break
D-backs pitcher David Hernandez left the game due to an injured ankle
originally E7 for batter advance, changed next day to remove error
fan interference

replay,6,uptoj001,ARI,gormb901,PHO01,I,N,I,,H $Justin Upton broke his bat on the fly that was touched by a fan at the LF wall as Alex Presley leaped to attempt a catch; the play was ruled a home run but the Pirates objected to the call; crew chief Brian Gorman watched the replay and upheld the call
originally scored as E5, changed next day to single plus error
$Justin Upton was hit on the front of the helmet by a 93-MPH fast ball
$D-backs right fielder Justin Upton left the game due to an injured head; he felt nauseous while running the bases
ej,bochb002,M,darlg901,Call at 2B $the throw beat Gerardo Parra but was high and 2B Jeff Keppinger did not tag Parra; Giants Manager Bruce Bochy ejected by 2B umpire Gary Darling
